name: Post Mortem (itch) (Knose)
description:
POST MORTEM
A Post-Post-Apocalyptic Point & Click Adventure.

Switch between Abbi and Abe as you try to escape a strange facility, through solving puzzles and opening locked doors.
Where are you? Why are you here?

Who are you?

CONTACT

If you find any bugs, typos, or if you have any suggestions on how to better my writing, please contact me through:
Email: knosedoge@storpenis.se
Discord: Knose#0688

Thank you!

CREDITS

Programming, Graphics, Development by Knose.

Sampled Music:
Dur och Moll om vartannat, by bob hund.
While My Guitar Gently Weeps, by The Beatles.

Sampled Sound Effects:
Female Super Single Laughter, by BerlinAtmospheres.
Crowd Talking, by Youtube Sound Library.
Long Vibration Sound Effect, by BerlinAtmospheres.
Subway Train Sound Effects, by 8 Hours of.
